```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(ggplot2)
users <- fromJSON('/Users/dtasse/src/urban_analytics/analyze/home_work/users_plus_bins.json')
names(users)

ggplot(users, aes(x=home_prediction_error_m)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=0.2) +
  scale_x_log10(breaks=c(1,10,100,1000,5000))

nrow(jsondata[users$home_prediction_error_m > 500, ])
nrow(jsondata[users$home_prediction_error_m <= 500, ])
```
So for about 2/3 of people, we're already within 500m.
